Understate: The claim may understate the number of appearances Sen. John McCain has made on "Meet the Press" by not providing the exact number.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the statement that Sen. John McCain holds the record for the most appearances on "Meet the Press."
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the number of appearances on "Meet the Press" is the sole determinant of holding the record, without considering other factors such as the length of each appearance or the impact of the appearances.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the definition of a "guest" on "Meet the Press" used by NBC and Sen. John McCain excludes journalists who appear on the show to debate the week's big stories, which could affect the accuracy of the claim.
